'''Mimosa Bunce''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Mimosa married [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto Baggins]]. They had two children; [[Rosa Baggins|Rosa]] was born in {{SR|1256}}, and [[Polo Baggins]] shortly thereafter.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Mimosa|Mimosa]] is a genus of plants (trees, shrubs and herbs) of the legume family.
